data.title: Vanessa Marcil Giovinazzo
data.text:
Quote frustratedfan: Congrats to Vanessa and Carmine! She married Carmine Giovinazzo of 'CSI:NY' on Sunday.

The article I read talks about the ratings spike GH experiences each time she returns…and she will return with a new name.

I hope she gets a good story and lots of screen time…she's my fav

Quote Clarity: I know I am in the minority on this character; however I must say out of all the past characters on this soap VM was my least favorite.

Her character is pathetic and will be just another boo-hoo on this show.

I wish they would bring back some real drama like; A.J., Faith or best Alcazar!
